en-US.summary: Malik weather assistant will help you getting weather details of different cities
examplePhrases: Alexa ask malik weather assistant to give weather of London
Alexa ask malik weather assistant, whatâ€™s the weather
en-US.name: Malik Weather Assistant
en-US.description:
Malik weather assistant will help you get weather details of different cities
Using this skill you can get the weather of Different cities
If you will not provide the city name it will give you the weather of Karachi
This is not a very sophisticated skill but a simple weather application that will provide you with simple weather details of Different cities
en-US.updatesDescription: this is the first version of this app

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
you can simply ask for the weather of any city in the world
for example: 

User: open malik weather assistant
Alexa: Hello! this is Malik Weather assistant. how may I help you today? you can ask me about weather
user: give me weather updates of new york city
Alexa: In New York, it's 41 degrees Fahrenheit with cloudy skies. Today's forecast calls for more of the same, with a high of 43 degrees and a low of 32 degrees.

-- conversation end ---
